entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
